review: Great side-scroller, if you liked Temple Run you'll like this. Got it on my iPhone just recently and it's addictive when you're on the commute to and from work.

review: This game is delightful and addictive. I love the art style and the quick combat. Unlockables, progression and achievements give this game loads of replayability.
